programme.desc: Mena returns to his home town and makes vegan ice cream with musician Tesher, then swings home to get a taste of his mum's Egyptian cooking.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: With days growing shorter and colder, Canadian wildlife is in a race against time, and any animal that fails to make the most of what autumn has to offer will perish.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: Baby Animals: Protecting babies against extreme conditions, hungry predators, and the threat of starvation, all animals must fight for the future of their species.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: The instinct to secure a mate is one of the most powerful that there is. From the beautiful to the bizarre, this episode explores the most amazing mating rituals from right across the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: It is now June, and the park is bathed in 17 hours of daylight. With the warm temperatures come rich pickings, but for the newborn the summer months are crucial as they learn to fight, find food and avoid predators.

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Autumn is when stags compete to breed, osprey chicks begin a 3000-mile migration to West Africa, salmon return to the rivers where they were born and adders give birth to live young.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe
programme.desc: This episode explores Marilyn’s determination to become a serious actress and her departure from Twentieth Century Fox to start her own production company.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe
programme.desc: This episode explores how Marilyn shows her mature talent as an actress and wins a triumphant victory over Twentieth Century Fox shortly before her untimely death.

programme.title: Matthew Perry: Not Just Friends
programme.desc: Matthew Perry, beloved for his role as Chandler Bing, is remembered through archive footage highlighting his comedic legacy and personal struggles, both on and off set, as a cherished friend and human being.

programme.title: Clint Eastwood: Make My Day
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood, Actor, director and philanthropist. From being the quintessential western icon, to honing his artistic skills and caring persona. This is his magnificent story.

programme.title: Michael J. Fox: Actor, Activist, Optimist
programme.desc: Michael J. Fox's life, from his rise to fame to a Parkinson's diagnosis at 29, has been nothing short of a real-life movie, marked by unexpected twists and remarkable resilience.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2
programme.desc: Witness the story of President Clinton's impeachment, presented through archival footage of the day.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2
programme.desc: Witness how America's South and Midwest were ravaged by 148 twisters in just 18 hours.

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel
programme.desc: As Manu heads past his halfway mark on his journey around the world, he heads to Tokyo to explore the bustling city. It is a massive challenge and he is having the time of his life but how is that budget going?

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: On his journey discovering China's history through its food, Adam arrives in Shandong - birthplace of Confucius and one of the oldest and most influential culinary traditions in China.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the most fascinating Chinese provinces - Yunnan. Infused with spice and fragrance from Southeast and Central Asia, people from all around China have fallen in love with this cuisine and culture.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives to the fiery provinces of Sichuan and Hunan and this time he's joined by celebrated chef and author Fuchsia Dunlop who is an expert on the region.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw is in Fujian - a place with a long history of migration where the movement of people left an enduring mark that manifested in its food and culture.

programme.desc: Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Set in 1917, young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong. The school is held hostage on the day of an English speech competition, and as Ip Man decides to step up and fight the crisis, it is revealed that his master and his childhood friend are behind all this. Can he take them down and uphold justice?

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the team’s downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Secret Reunion
programme.desc: Ji Won, a North Korean spy, is on a mission to assassinate a defector. South Korean intelligence agent Han Gyu discovers the plot and attempts to arrest him but fails. Six years later, they cross paths again and maintain a tense relationship, but an unusual friendship also blossoms.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Dachimawa Lee: Gangnam Spy
programme.desc: Legendary Korean spy Dachimawa Lee is assigned to recover the stolen national treasure, a Golden Buddha, and reveal the dark plot. However, his mission ends in failure and Agent Lee must now face off the mysterious mastermind on the snowy slopes of Switzerland, where the statue is believed to be hidden.

programme.title: RUTE:Toughness Redefined
programme.desc: The growing regional competition R U Tough Enough is searching for the toughest person from Southeast Asia. Join the search and meet some of the most mentally and physically strong individuals, leading up to an epic final showdown in Kuala Lumpur for the prize of US$15,000!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Squad 2
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean military survival show brings eight Special Force units together to compete in extreme missions that will test their physical stamina, mental strength and teamwork. Top male reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle till the end in front of five celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: It’s time for the first commitment ceremony, where everyone will decide whether to stay or leave their partners and this experiment.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Italian Dream Home (S1)
programme.desc: Rachael's villa would not be complete without a spectacular bedroom. Crew needs to figure out how to create a bedroom with a kitchen in suite, giving new meaning to the phrase "breakfast in bed."

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Italian Dream Home (S1)
programme.desc: What was once a barn is now being transformed into a fully-fledged music hall! Rachael's husband John is a musician, and entertaining their guests will be on the menu.

programme.title: Temptation Under The Sun
programme.desc: While vacationing on an exotic island Detective Cassady Cruz begins a torrid affair with charming expat Travis King, but when his ex-girlfriend, Minnie, winds up dead he is accused of her murder.

programme.title: The Paramedic Who Stalked Me
programme.desc: After an accident, a young woman finds herself the target of the EMT who saved her life. She reminds him of his high school love who died - and he will do anything to have her back in his life.

programme.title: Buddy Valastro's Cake Dynasty
programme.desc: The Mother's Day rush is one of the busiest times of the year, and Buddy is stressed! He needs to create a custom cake for the 50th Anniversary of Secretariat's Triple Crown win.

programme.title: Deliciously Twisted Classics

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: Single parents Selin and Anthony’s chemistry is palpable from the moment they lock eyes, but will Tamara’s pretentious viewpoints prove too much for her groom Brent?

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: Tired of the modern dating scene and out of options, two new couples enter the experiment hoping the experts can find their match. But are they as good as they think they are?

programme.title: The Killer I Picked Up
programme.desc: When a hardworking single mom starts a side job as a rideshare driver to help pay for her daughter's college tuition, she becomes the unrelenting obsession of a mysterious rider with a dark past.

programme.title: Look Who's Stalking
programme.desc: After the death of her stalker, a new mother pieces her life back together. But when she realises she's being targeted again she's forced to uncover whether she's being stalked from the grave.

programme.title: Disappearance In Yellowstone
programme.desc: When Jessie's car breaks down in the middle of a national park and her daughter locks herself inside, she heads off to look for help, but returns to her car to discover her daughter has vanished.

programme.title: CSI S3 E10 - High and Low
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.desc: The team seeks out the wreck of the Revonoc, a racing yacht that vanished in 1958 with a crew of five. A freak magnetic anomaly was detected in the Triangle when she went missing.

programme.title: Alone (S10)
programme.desc: The three remaining survivalists brace themselves for the fight to the finish. One participant finds it impossible to stay warm, while others risk it all on the ice. Only one can claim the $500,000 prize.

programme.title: Alone: Frozen (S1)
programme.desc: With no time to waste before brutal Labrador winter temperatures set in, the participants struggle to establish themselves in their harsh new environment.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: Marvin Glass oversees the creation of many of the most iconic toys of the 20th century. From chattering teeth to a legendary game based on a mouse trap, Glass pushes the boundaries of what a toy can be.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: The fellowship is stunned when evidence suggests that a dam lies buried at the end of the swamp, corroborating both Fred Nolan's theory and Zena Halpern's Templar map.

programme.title: Kings Of Pain (S2)
programme.desc: Rob and Adam test the pain dished out by a trio of unlikely creatures commonly kept in home aquariums, and proceed to ruin the image of a popular cartoon movie character for millions of children.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S1)
programme.desc: Human bones as a 'miracle cure' for gout? Living mummies buried alive? A truly bizarre Victorian way to lose weight—with tapeworms? The stranger side of human nature is revealed in these rituals.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid
programme.desc: England's Stonehenge and the Moai statues of Easter Island have inspired awe for centuries. But will we ever fully understand how and why these ancient sacred structures came to be?

programme.desc: An armoured car depot employee uses his insider knowledge to plan a heist that could net him, and the friends he recruits, more than $18 million in cash.

programme.desc: Buckle up as host Peyton Manning counts down the top ten sports cars of all time as voted on by a panel of experts. From the Mustang to the Ferrari, which car gets your engine running?

programme.title: Pieta 1
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Amanda (Charito Solis) and her unconditional love for her son Rigor (Ace Vergel). Rigor grows up not having to follow any rules and he does not cultivate a conscience. In his dealings with the underworld, he meets syndicate head Johnny Wilson. Will this pave the way for his all-out excursion to evil?

programme.title: Hanggang Dito na Lang
programme.desc: Hilda Koronel discovered that love, fidelity and being a perfect wife and mother were not enough to keep a husband from straying.

programme.title: Narito Ang Puso Ko
programme.desc: Ellen and Louie are estranged lovers whose son is accidentally shot by Tato, a son of a prominent politician. However, in their constant vigil besides their comatose son, their feelings towards each other are rekindled.

programme.title: Dyesebel (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The retelling of the classic tale by the great Mars Ravelo. After years of hiding from a cruel, suspicious society on the land, mermaid Dyesebel (Charlene Gonzales) returns and falls in love with a man named Fredo (Matthew Mendoza).

programme.title: Carnap King (The Randy Padilla Story)
programme.desc: The story of the most delinquent of the Padilla brothers. Randy was the problem child to his father. This conflict led him to leave and stay with his mother who love him so much. His reputation as a bad boy was stuck when he stole a car to impress a girl.

programme.title: Smith & Wesson
programme.desc: Comedians Vic & Joey play ace detectives Jessie Smith and James Wesson. As part of the famed "Mayumi Vice Squad" under Mayor Mayumi, the dynamic duo match wits against the equally notorious Tio Pablo.

programme.title: Beauty and the Best (Concert)
programme.desc: Nostalgia fills the air as the talented Bhen Rosas joins veteran singers Rico J. Puno and Hajji Alejandro in an evening of beautiful music in BEAUTY AND THE BEST

programme.title: Dahil Tanging Ikaw
programme.desc: Erika and Cecil are twins who were separated by poverty right after they were born. Each of them was caught up in her own existence, not knowing that somewhere not so far lived a twin. But one day, fate found a clever way to bring them back together.

programme.title: Isla 2
programme.desc: Celso Ad Castillo once again directs with newcomer Via Veloso in the title role of Isla, the young girl who will do anything just to be able to escape her lustful adoptive father and the desolate island where she might spend her entire life.

programme.title: Apat na Anak ni Adan
programme.desc: This movie centers on the relationship among four brothers and their collective exploits.

programme.title: Maruja
programme.desc: The classic love story by Mars Ravelo came to life again on the motion picture screen. Maruja, the daughter of a rich landowner and Gabriel, the illegitimate son of a Spanish friar, first fell in love a hundred years ago.

programme.title: Paano Tatakasan Ang Bukas?
programme.desc: Desiree and Gilbert are in love but no one seems to believe it.

programme.title: Brando Bandido
programme.desc: Would it be really a surprise if the enigmatic avenger "Brando Bandido" (Andy Poe) is actually Zardo's son, all grown-up and ready to get back at his father's killers?

programme.desc: Francine Lacqua interviews some of the most influential people on the planet.

programme.desc: Froga gets a new beautiful Sunflower Plant and decides to put it in her greenhouse. But she realizes that has been using her greenhouse to store all the items she doesn't know what to do with anymore. Now there's no room for her plant!

programme.desc: Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry. // Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.desc: Chef and Olly are making dumplings, but when first-timer Olly is better at making them, Chef must regain his confidence in his folding skills.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When a burgling buccaneer steals every pillow in Axle City, it's up to Special Mission Blaze to save bedtime! Using his new Special Mission Modes and the power of addition, can Blaze solve this pillow problem?

programme.desc: Farmer Yumi's carrots are disappearing and she calls Ryder and the Paw Patrol for help. // Katie is excited to be entering one of the Paw Patrol pups into a puppy grooming competition "Puptacular" in the next town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Daring Danny X takes his horse off the trail and ends up on a wild ride.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Sharkdog and Dennis get stuck together (literally!), Max must find a way to separate them before the big surf contest.

programme.title: Sharkdog

programme.desc: Grandpa Pig hides some treasure in his garden, and when Peppa and George come, they have to look for it.

programme.desc: Peppa has chicken pox, and has to stay in bed until she gets better.

programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the Windy Castle, and when they get there, they have a wonderful view from the top.

programme.desc: Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.desc: Paddington builds a robot called PaddingTron that requires a real friend to work. // Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him and Paddington is his helpful assistant, but will they both get to enjoy the fireworks finale?

programme.desc: Special Mission Blaze is on the case! When the Baby Robot from Outer Space turns everyone into babies, it's up to Blaze and his new Special Mission Modes to save the day! Can he rescue his friends, or will he be the next baby on the block?

programme.title: Hack My Life Inside Hacks S1 17

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: In the future, North America is no more. In its place has risen Panem, a divided nation split into 12 districts. Every year, each district selects a teen of each gender (called "Tributes") to test their worth in a competition known as the Hunger Games. Part entertainment, part brutal retribution for a past rebellion, the televised games are broadcast throughout Panem. The 24 participants are forced to eliminate their competitors while the citizens of Panem are required to watch. When her younger sister is selected as District 12's latest "Tribute," Katniss volunteers to take her place, and trains under hard-drinking former Hunger Games champion Haymitch Abernathy to sharpen her killer instincts. Now in order to survive the game and emerge the victor, this young combatant must put all of her skills to the ultimate test.

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: What if, in the wake of more than a decade of devastating weather events, we finally found a way to control Mother Nature and the destruction her tirades entail? When catastrophic climate change endangers Earth’s very survival, world governments unite and create Project Dutch Boy: a global net of satellites surrounding the planet that are armed with geo-engineering technologies designed to stave off the natural disasters. After successfully protecting the planet for two years, something is starting to go wrong. Two estranged brothers (Gerard Butler, Jim Sturgess) are tasked with solving the program’s malfunction before a worldwide geostorm can engulf the planet.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 89
programme.desc: When you need to know what's going on in the morning, turn to Gemma Veness for up to the minute news and events as they unfold. Plus the latest in politics, business, sport with Catherine Murphy and weather with Nate Byrne.

programme.title: This Boy's Life
programme.desc: A heart breaking coming-of-age story about a boy's abusive relationship with his new stepfather, and his emotionally scarred mother.

programme.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
programme.desc: Mr. and Mrs. Fox live an idyllic home life but after twelve years of quiet domesticity, the bucolic existence proves too much for Mr. Fox's wild animal instincts. Director Wes Anderson's adaptation of a beloved children's novel by Roald Dahl.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: The story concerns a squad of U.S. Army soldiers on a perilous assignment behind enemy lines. The mission: to risk their lives to save the life of one man, paratrooper James Ryan. Ryan is the last survivor of a family of four brothers, the rest of whom have been killed in action.

programme.title: Heat
programme.desc: A hardened expert thief plans one last heist, but the cop on the case is obsessed with bringing him down.

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: When a fugitive couple's glamorous and sometimes deadly adventure erupts into a maze of double-crosses, close escapes, false identities, and head-spinning romantic snafus, they come to realize that all they can count on is each other.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: A daring yet reckless pilot who shuns teamwork and the rules of engagement eventually learns the importance of cooperation and discipline. Along the way he has a fiery affair, does some spectacular flying and causes the death of his best friend.

programme.title: Shutter
programme.desc: A newly married couple discovers disturbing, ghostly images in photographs they develop after an eerie accident in which they believe they may have hit a young girl with their car.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Two buddies-one blind, the other deaf-go on the run to solve a murder and clear their names.

programme.title: Days Of Thunder
programme.desc: A hotshot stock car racer finds more than fame in the south - love for a neurosurgeon who has a marked disdain for racing.

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: There comes a time in every adolescent's life when he must fake out his parents and blow off a day of school. This is Ferris Bueller's day. A grandmaster in the game of adult manipulation.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Two buddies-one blind, the other deaf-go on the run to solve a murder and clear their names.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: A typical married couple a little bored with their relationship come to discover that they are enemy assassins hired to kill each other.

programme.title: Karikal Mahal: A Silent Witness
programme.desc: The story of a mysterious mansion, Karikal Mahal in early 1900s Singapore that looked like a palace with its lake, fountains and bungalows on sprawling grounds the size of two-and-a-half football fields.

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents…

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Nightmare of Darkness
programme.desc: A young actress’ Weibo account is refreshed with a new post three years after her death, disclosing her dating picture with young idol Wu Zi Zhen. Wu seeks help from the PR consultant Qiao Shen at his haunted house, but encounters a series of horrifying incidents. After being interrogated by Qiao, Wu lowers his guard and unveils a shocking secret…

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death…

programme.title: Bunshinsaba: Hoichi the Earless
programme.desc: You Mei brings home an abandoned doll found on the street. Little does she know that it is possessed by an evil spirit which causes the sudden death of her colleague. You Mei seeks help from a ghost hunter who unleashes the pencil spirit to fight against the evil spirit, unfortunately leading to a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents…

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple start to experience insanely terrifying incidents with the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: Death of a Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Christine was found brutally murdered in the woods, her boyfriend, a forest ranger and a farmer are summoned to an inquest. Each suspect has his version to tell, but as the investigation progresses, a dark secret is uncovered, which would reveal the real murderer.

programme.title: Get in the Dark
programme.desc: A reporter hears three horror stories when investigating a case of the paper doll spirit 20 years ago. Miss Qiao had died in vain then, and her butler paid a paper craftsman to make a paper doll to be buried with her. Miss Qiao’s spirit is revived to take revenge when the doll’s eyes are drawn, and a series of horrible events begins to happen...

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple start to experience insanely terrifying incidents with the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: Death of a Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Christine was found brutally murdered in the woods, her boyfriend, a forest ranger and a farmer are summoned to an inquest. Each suspect has his version to tell, but as the investigation progresses, a dark secret is uncovered, which would reveal the real murderer.

programme.title: Get in the Dark
programme.desc: A reporter hears three horror stories when investigating a case of the paper doll spirit 20 years ago. Miss Qiao had died in vain then, and her butler paid a paper craftsman to make a paper doll to be buried with her. Miss Qiao’s spirit is revived to take revenge when the doll’s eyes are drawn, and a series of horrible events begins to happen...

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: A career criminal and first-time arrestee bond in custody; an expecting father faces the prospect of missing his child's birth, and a 20-year-old aspiring model gets a taste of the inside of a jail cell.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: After a 14-year-old boy is shot to death outside of a friend's house, detectives wonder if he was caught in the middle of a sinister plot.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: When Gwinnett County detectives find a mother stabbed to death, identifying her killer falls to her young son. But testifying at trial could be difficult for the child.

programme.title: Digital Addiction
programme.desc: Skyler spends all of her time creating and consuming content on social media about being a young mom. Nina's digital addiction is causing a rift between her and her husband.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. A fugitive shows up to the courthouse but changes his mind and flees from officers; an assault victim confronts her attacker in court; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. An accused murderer escapes from the courthouse; a teenager goes on trial for robbing a 9-year-old selling Girl Scout cookies; and more.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest
programme.desc: A man leads police on a high-speed chase in a stolen mail truck. A restaurant owner is arrested after hiding drugs in a takeout box. A pizza delivery guy helps the cops arrest a thief; and more.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country. A man decides to interrupt his crime to make a pizza; police track down a man who jumped through the roof of a port-a-potty; and more.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8)
programme.desc: The first three participants enter Pitt County Detention Center to begin their 60 days inside the jail.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Kelsey's family knew something was amiss when their usually responsible and responsive daughter didn't respond to their texts while out running an errand.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: 9-year-old Kamryn Johnson is supposed to be at gymnastics class when her mother, Sheraton, receives a frantic phone call saying Kamryn is being held captive for ransom.

programme.title: See No Evil (S6)
programme.desc: In the dead of winter, a 14-year-old girl vanishes without a trace on her way to school and her parents have no idea where she could be. Will the missing teenager be found before it’s too late?

programme.title: See No Evil (S6)
programme.desc: 18-year-old Kyle Farishian is working the late shift on Halloween when he is brutally attacked by a masked assailant. Surveillance footage helps detectives track down the culprit.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: After a man is shot dead, pathologist Dr. Antoine Wrice works with investigators to interpret unusual evidence found on the scene and unwind the complex case that could be more than a typical homicide.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: An undercover NYPD officer and an ATF special agent learn firsthand not to trust a suspect's demeanour, regardless of how amicable it may appear.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: In a story that gripped the nation, three Cleveland women are rescued ten years after vanishing from the city's streets. Now, authorities must confront the man at the heart of this notorious crime.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: When a 17-year-old transgender social media influencer goes silent, her family and fans fear foul play. Digital data ultimately allows detectives to track the movements of their suspect.

programme.title: Comme Des Têtes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Vic takes a career aptitude test at school and is disturbed by the result: undertaker! As she tries to mould herself to fit the job she finally realises that Cindy has falsified the results.

programme.title: Ernest Et Célestine, La Collection
programme.desc: Ernest, a grumpy bear with a generous heart, offers a home to Célestine, a mischievous little orphan mouse, in his tumbledown house. Two friends with characters as different as their size; but that doesn't stop them enjoying endless adventures filled with fun and fantasy.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie
programme.desc: A journey throughout the French-speaking world to explore every corner of the globe! In each country we meet francophones who present, in French, their culture, way of life and commitments. The programme also shines a spotlight on local projects that keep the French language alive, dynamic and constantly evolving.

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: À Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Le Grand Cactus
programme.desc: Humour with spikes on! Phony reports, high-jacked programmes, pretend live broadcasts, mock celebrity interviews, fake adverts, street interviews... With their team of presenters, Adrien Devyver and Jérôme de Warzée bring their own unique twist to news from Belgium and around the world, so prepare for a result that's distinctly... lively!

programme.title: Échappées Belles
programme.desc: Greece, the birthplace of Western civilisation, welcomes Chef Anto on a culinary odyssey through the country's history and culture. Olives, cheese, including the famous feta, oregano, sun-drenched vegetables and fresh fish are musts for cooking full of flavour.

programme.title: Rugby - Coupe D'Europe Des Clubs
programme.desc: Rugby. 2025 Challenge Cup. Semi-final. Matmut Stadium Gerland (Lyon, France). 1st half.

programme.title: Rugby - Coupe D'Europe Des Clubs
programme.desc: Rugby. 2025 Challenge Cup. Semi-final. Matmut Stadium Gerland (Lyon, France). 2nd half.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Rugby - Coupe D'Europe Des Clubs
programme.desc: Rugby. 2025 Champions Cup. Semi-final. Matmut Atlantique (Bordeaux, France). 1st half.

programme.title: Rugby - Coupe D'Europe Des Clubs
programme.desc: Rugby. 2025 Champions Cup. Semi-final. Matmut Atlantique (Bordeaux, France). 2nd half.

programme.title: Rendez-Vous Au Parc
programme.desc: The idyllic Calanca valley, in the Grisons, a few kilometres from Ticino, is a unique setting. The presence of traditional colonies, surrounded by woods and rural landscapes, contributes to the wild character of the valley. Rich in biodiversity and easily accessible, Val Calanca welcomes nature lovers.

programme.title: Des Racines & Des Ailes
programme.desc: Exploring the city of Quebec, all the way to the Saguenay Fjords National Park, in deep mid-winter then in autumn as the forest dons its most vibrant colours. With historian and photographer Pierre Lahoud, we fly over the icebound Saint Lawrence, one of the world's most dangerous navigable waterways.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Ramón Mercader, Sur Les Pas De Celui Qui A Tué Trotsky
programme.desc: Mexico, 20 August 1940. Ramón Mercader assassinated Leon Trotsky. Who was he? Why did he do it? A Communist activist who came to the notice of the KGB during the Spanish Civil War, the enigmatic Mercader constantly disappeared, gradually moving closer to his victim. He never admitted his true identity.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Les Rois De La Comédie : Fernandel, Jacques Tati, Bourvil, Louis De Funès
programme.desc: A look back at the filmography of French comedy four icons. Fernandel, Jacques Tati, Bourvil and Louis de Funès all met success, simultaneously, at the end of the 1950s, in front of or behind the camera. How did they become box-office stars? What was life like being so immensely popular?

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes
programme.desc: Between the purchase of raw materials and the resale of processed products to consumers, traffickers in marijuana, cocaine, heroin, fentanyl and amphetamines make colossal profits. Morocco, Afghanistan, Colombia, Mexico, Albania: a close-up look at the drug economy and the havoc it wreaks along the way.

programme.title: Frontière Verte
programme.desc: Exploring the edge of the boreal forest, where the Arctic, alpine regions and ocean meet. This project is led by Karine Genest. The explorer is intrigued by the overlapping of species and their capacity to survive. With scientists and guides, she discovers the secrets of the wild.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie

programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Prévoir L'Imprévisible
programme.desc: Society is slowly but surely coming to an end. At least, this is what collapsologists, people who believe in the theory of global and systemic collapse, are predicting. What is the situation in Canada? We meet some of them who are leaving cities, engaging in activism, cultivating their gardens...

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: They are invisible but essential: the dockworkers moor and undock all the merchant ships that enter and leave the ports. Sailors on land, they live on the watch, just like on a ship. In an increasingly automated world, they are an essential link in global maritime trade.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The sisters think Lincoln is bad luck so they ban him from attending their activities. // When Lincoln finds out his class is dissecting frogs, he and Lana embark on a mission to rescue them.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.desc: To save his brothers, Mikey needs the help of Bishop's intern, ROD. But Rod wants something in return... to be turned into a MUTANT! To save the day, Mikey has to become... RESPONSIBLE.

programme.desc: Cherry visits, and the Thundermans discover she still has her superpowers. Cherry promises to remove them after her girls' day with Phoebe and Chloe, but the powers malfunction and puts the group in danger. Max hosts Jinx, making Colosso jealous.

programme.desc: Ray has trusted Henry and Charlotte with protecting Swellview while he’s out of town at his cousin's wedding. Problems arise when they find themselves having to handle things on their own.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Hoping to win a song-writing contest, Luna contemplates whether she should go with a song that's true to her sound or try to make something that the whole world will love.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: After agreeing to go to The Royal Woods House of Terror, Linc and Clyde have to toughen up and face their fears. // Lola discovers Lucy has an old, fragile doll and decides she must borrow it - no matter what Lucy says.
